mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User (user_id, password, email, nickname, created_date, authority, login_type) VALUES (#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{createdDate}, #{authority}, #{loginType})
mapper.select: SELECT user_key as userKey, user_id as userId, password, email, nickname, created_date, authority, login_type, profilepic, activated FROM User WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id FROM User WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET password = #{password} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
UPDATE User SET activated = false WHERE user_key = #{userKey}
